ygData.subject: Re: Petition and general opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve noticed this about certain mobs - they fight better just before they re about to die.  Kinda like warriors go into a frenzy.  Learn which ones do it,
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 9 Jun 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> Freeport I decide to pull a lesser mummy from the ruins in east commons
> because it cons blue to me...the fight is going decent, I have the upper
> hand, and then when the mummy gets down to 2 bubbles it suddenly kicks my
> ass? Lost all the XP I gained soloing snakes for 4 hours in that one
> mistake.

I've noticed this about certain mobs - they fight better just
before they're about to die. Kinda like warriors go into a
frenzy. Learn which ones do it, then avoid them when you solo
unless you're sure you can take them.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
